meanings.definition: A person or thing that creates.
meanings.sent1: The creators of the painting used vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Artists are known as creators of beautiful masterpieces.
meanings.sent3: The creators of the cake forgot to add sugar, making it taste like bread.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, composers are the creators of symphonies that touch the soul.
meanings.sent5: The creators of the new video game worked tirelessly to bring their vision to life.

meanings.sent1: Ancient civilizations believed in creators who shaped the world.
meanings.sent2: The creators in Greek mythology were powerful gods and goddesses.
meanings.sent3: The creators above must have a sense of humor to make such quirky animals.
meanings.sent4: The creators of the universe are often depicted as mysterious and all-knowing.
meanings.sent5: Legends speak of creators who watch over us from the heavens.

meanings.definition: The original writer of a literary work.
meanings.sent1: Shakespeare is considered one of the greatest creators of English literature.
meanings.sent2: The creators of famous novels often draw inspiration from their own experiences.
meanings.sent3: The creators of the play decided to add a funny twist to the ending.
meanings.sent4: As the creator of the epic poem, Homer's influence on literature is profound.
meanings.sent5: The creators of the short story captivated readers with their vivid descriptions.
